title: BFICS - Digitizing Fire Inspection and Certification Processes
subTitle: Digitizing Fire Inspection and Certification Processes for Buildings in Nigeria
users: Federal and State Fire Service Organizations
collaborators: CEO, COO, Product Manager, Front End and Backend Developers
description: BFICS - Buildings Fire and Insurance Certification System enables fire personnels to inspect, fine and issue fire and insurance certificates to building owners and occupiers

title: Doshup Student Savings Mobile App Casestudy
subTitle: Growing Wealth, Growing Minds: The Future of Student Finance
collaborators: CEO, COO, Product Manager, Front End and Backend Developers
description: Doshup's design helps college and university students salvage their financial situation after graduation through dedicated savings, flexible investment plans, and other key features.

title: Insurance Committee Dashboard Casestudy
subTitle: Accessing Data on Insured Buildings and Buildings Under Construction
users: Nigerian National Committee in charge of monitoring building insurance, including those under construction
collaborators: CEO, COO, Product Manager, Front End and Backend Developers
description: Defined and designed this solution within a very tight timeline. The Insurance Committee dashboard is a solution that is intended to improve the accessibility of data on insured and uninsured buildings in the country.
